attributes.action: Every key worker should be a part of the special hour in supermarkets.
attributes.additional_details: All key workers are helping to prop up the country during this testing time so should receive the same treatment as NHS workers. If education staff weren't continuing to be in schools or delivery drivers taking food to stores and homes and to the many more key workers providing service to the country to keep it going.
attributes.background: Make supermarkets and business include all key workers in the special treatment of 1 hour shopping or a free coffee or so much % off food.

rejection.details:
The opening arrangements for supermarkets are a matter for individual retailers, not the Government or Parliament. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
